subject: Re: [junit] Re: Type safe categories
msgSnippet: ... It s very easy to simulate: running the group db.* in TestNG will run all the groups that belong to a group that starts with db . Naming your groups in
messageBody:
On Fri, Sep 21, 2012 at 3:26 PM, tibord47 <tibord47@...> wrote:

> What frameworks they would be if all had the same ideas -strings.
> Strings do not know inheritance.
>

It's very easy to simulate: running the group "db.*" in TestNG will run all
the groups that belong to a group that starts with "db". Naming your groups
in a hierarchical way similar to packages ("db.fast", "db.slow",
"frontend.login", etc...) leads to a very flexible way to structure your
tests.

--
Cédric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
